unnormalised: Hey! I've been trying mental health apps too. It's tough finding one that clicks, right? I heard good things about Fortis Healthcare's app. My cousin, Priya, uses one, says it helps with her anxiety. During Onam, everything feels more overwhelming. Maybe try guided meditations? Just like Mom's biryani, the right app can bring comfort.
